price: 61. Nabiyow ama koros qaranwaa kee baaxó iyyi gineeh, ayróo kee alsá iyyi qaneeh axcuk ken essertek diggah Yalla axcelon. Toysa diggah Yallal yaamineenimik mannal daggaawaanaah mannal dirabboysaanaah woh yeelemeeniik gamadal.
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara layaqūlunna al-lahu fa-annā yu'fakūna
